entities

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.State

  • public final class State
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to save the state of GRIT to the disk and read from it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      State(java.io.File file)
      Loads the state from the specified File.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addConnection(Connection connection)
      Saves an connection to the state.
      void addCourse(Course course)
      Saves a course to the state.
      void addExercise(int courseId, Exercise exercise)
      Saves an exercise to the state.
      void deleteConnection(int id)
      Deletes the specified connection.
      void deleteCourse(int id)
      Deletes the specified course.
      void deleteExercise(int courseId, int exerciseId)
      Deletes the specified exercise.
      java.lang.String readWholeXML()
      Reads the content of the StateXML file and returns it as String.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Connection> restoreConnections()
      Loads the Connections from the state.xml.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Course> restoreCourses()
      Loads all courses from the state file and starts all containing exercises.
      void save()
      Convenience shortcut for saving.
      void updateCourse(int courseId, java.lang.String courseName)
      Updates a course with a new Name.

      Writes an updated exercise to the state.xml.
      void writeWholeXML(java.lang.String textToWrite)
      Writes the content of the String into the state.xml.

    • Constructor Detail

      • State

        public State(java.io.File file)
      throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException,
             java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Loads the state from the specified File.
        Parameters:
        file - the file the config is stored in
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the config file is malformed
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the specified file can't be found

    • Method Detail

      • restoreCourses

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Course> restoreCourses()
                                                       throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Loads all courses from the state file and starts all containing exercises. This needs to be called after restoring the connections, as the courses depend on them!
        Returns:
        a list containing all stored courses
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException

      • addCourse

        public void addCourse(Course course)
               throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Saves a course to the state.
        Parameters:
        course - the course to be saved
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - If the saving fails

      • addConnection

        public void addConnection(Connection connection)
                   throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Saves an connection to the state.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - If the saving fails

      • addExercise

        public void addExercise(int courseId,
               Exercise exercise)
                 throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Saves an exercise to the state.
        Parameters:
        courseId - the course id
        exercise - the exercise
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the saving fails

      • restoreConnections

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Connection> restoreConnections()
                                                               throws InvalidStructureException
        Loads the Connections from the state.xml.
        Returns:
        a Map containing the connections, with the ID of the connections as the Key.
        Throws:
        InvalidStructureException - if the structure is invalid

      • save

        public void save()
          throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Convenience shortcut for saving.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the saving fails

        public void deleteCourse(int id)
                  throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Deletes the specified course.
        Parameters:
        id - the id
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the saving of the state fails

        public void deleteExercise(int courseId,
                  int exerciseId)
                    throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Deletes the specified exercise.
        Parameters:
        courseId - the course id
        exerciseId - the exercise id
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - the configuration exception

      • updateCourse

        public void updateCourse(int courseId,
                java.lang.String courseName)
                  throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Updates a course with a new Name.
        Parameters:
        courseId - the id of the course to be updated
        courseName - the new name for the course
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the saving fails

      • readWholeXML

        public java.lang.String readWholeXML()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the content of the StateXML file and returns it as String.
        Returns:
        the content of the state.xml file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file can't be read.

      • writeWholeXML

        public void writeWholeXML(java.lang.String textToWrite)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the content of the String into the state.xml. ATTENTION! the system needs to be rebooted after running this method!
        Parameters:
        textToWrite - the content for the state.xml file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the old state.xml could not be deleted

      • updateExercise

        public void updateExercise(int courseId,
                  int exerciseId,
                  Exercise exercise)
                    throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Writes an updated exercise to the state.xml.
        Parameters:
        courseId - the id of the course the exercise belongs to
        exerciseId - the id of the exercise
        exercise - the exercise itself
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the state could not be saved
